alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Southern Carroll; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Strafford, southeastern Belknap and southeastern Carroll Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alton, or 13 miles southeast of Laconia, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ossipee, Farmington, Alton, Barnstead, Gilmanton, Effingham, Wolfeboro, Gilford, Acton, Brookfield, Wakefield, Strafford, New Durham, Middleton, Tuftonboro, Parsonsfield, Milton and Newfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
